scripts.prepare:dist: npm run build && rm -rf cmd/dist && cp -r references/.vitepress/dist cmd/dist
scripts.build:server: npm run prepare:dist && cd cmd && go build -o ../site-server main.go
scripts.build:server:linux: npm run prepare:dist && cd cmd && CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ../site-server-linux main.go
scripts.build:server:darwin: npm run prepare:dist && cd cmd && CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ../site-server-darwin main.go
scripts.build:server:windows: npm run prepare:dist && cd cmd && CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -o ../site-server.exe main.go
scripts.build:all: npm run build:server:linux && npm run build:server:darwin && npm run build:server:windows
